text: @seanhannity The survivors from COVID-19 swear by this treatment,  you wanna tell them its quackery? Sick ppl have a right to try, @NYGovCuomo is not GOD, the decision is solely with the doctor & patient if he's not allowing that option in New York that's why his morbidity rate us high.
